Articles.Content:
I currently have KSP 1.0. My KSP was acting weird plus 1.0 was a nice update. Patcher says 'Hold on, we're getting set up.' and will never load Patcher.

Please help

-CDK
The patcher has been broken for quite some time. You'll need to manually download a new version.

The patcher hasn't functioned properly since a long time. Easiest is to go back to the place you bought KSP and manually re-download.

Edit: Ninja'd

Yep, patcher [is having issues](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/120983-The-launcher-will-not-update-KSP-this-is-a-known-issue-see-here-for-help). ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Also, moved to Support.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-01T18:51:16Z" title="07/01/2015 06:51  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 1, 2015</time> by Vanamonde**
